node.excerpt: Recently, I moved into my new home. It was very exited moment moving from older home to new one for my family. My kids were also exited, rather focusing much more on transition, they focus much more on other exited things i.e. amenities, play area, swimming pool and much more – this is obvious, and we left them with their excitement. After getting the possession, there is general process to check…

frontmatter.title: How to prevent downstream problems?
frontmatter.description: Describing my own experience to learn about very important concept about considering facts while coding
